name: @tonkeeper/core
author: Nikita Kuznetsov <nkuz915@gmail.com>
description: Core features and state for tonkeeper web wallet

scripts.build: rm -fr dist && yarn generate:sdkV1 && yarn generate:sdkV2 && tsc
scripts.docker:generate:sdkV1: rm -fr src/tonApiV1 && docker build -f Dockerfile.apiV1 . -t tonapisdk && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local tonapisdk
scripts.docker:generate:sdkV2: rm -fr src/tonApiV2 && docker build -f Dockerfile.apiV2 . -t tonapisdk && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local tonapisdk
